content.text: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages.
content.html: HTML is the standard markup language for creating web pages. It is used to define the structure of a web page by giving meaning and context to the content.

content.text: CSS is used to style the HTML elements on a web page.
content.html: CSS is used to style the HTML elements on a web page. It is used to control the layout, colors, fonts, and other visual aspects of a web page.

content.text: JavaScript is used to add interactivity to a web page.
content.html: JavaScript is used to add interactivity to a web page. It is used to make web pages dynamic and responsive to user interactions.
